data.title: Promising Practice: No-interest revolving loans
data.excerpt: Maisha Bahati is the CEO of Crystal Nugs, the first Black and woman owned non-storefront delivery business in Sacramento. She was one of the first equity applicants in Sacramento’s Cannabis Opportunity Reinvestment and Equity (CORE) Program and is in the process of expanding her business with a retail storefront.

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
